thread.title: Deal: Save $65 on a SanDisk 256GB microSD card
thread.title_full: Deal: Save $65 on a SanDisk 256GB microSD card

author: Mitja Rutnik
title: Deal: Save $65 on a SanDisk 256GB microSD card
text:
If you consider yourself a heavy user where storage space is concerned and are constantly deleting images, videos, and other data just to make room for new content, you probably need a memory card with extra large capacity. Good news: Amazon has a great deal on the SanDisk Ultra 256 GB microSD card, saving you a third of the price.
The retailer currently has it for $134.99, which is $65 off its usual list price. There’s an SD adapter included, and the product comes with a 10-year limited warranty. Amazon will also send the memory card to your doorstep free of charge, which will save you a few extra bucks.
See also: SanDisk’s new 256GB microSD card is made for launching mobile apps January 5, 2017 This is a great deal for all you content creators out there so if you want to get the SanDisk Ultra 256 GB microSD card, visit Amazon’s website by clicking the button below to place your order. But before you do, don’t forget to check if your device actually supports a 256 GB memory card.
Get the deal
